block.p: Babetta von Albertini, a daughter of Verene von Albertini and Dr. Andreas von Albertini of Zurich, was married on Monday to Andrew T. Mason, a son of Carol and Theodore T. Mason of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y. Ms. Verena Kumin, a marriage clerk for the City of Zurich, officiated. A religious ceremony was performed yesterday by Canon Wilfred M. Debney, an Anglican priest, at Santa Maria del Sasso Church in Morcote, Switzerland.

Mrs. Mason was until April an associate in the London office of Shearman & Sterling, the New York law firm. She graduated from Zurich University Law School and received a master of laws degree from New York University. Her father retired as a judge for the Court of Appeals in Zurich, and is now a lawyer in private practice. Her mother teaches French and introduction to medical terminology at the Pre-Professional School for Hospital Careers in Zurich.

Babetta von Albertini, a daughter of Verene von Albertini and Dr. Andreas von Albertini of Zurich, was married on Monday to Andrew T. Mason, a son of Carol and Theodore T. Mason of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y. Ms. Verena Kumin, a marriage clerk for the City of Zurich, officiated. A religious ceremony was performed yesterday by Canon Wilfred M. Debney, an Anglican priest, at Santa Maria del Sasso Church in Morcote, Switzerland.

Mrs. Mason was until April an associate in the London office of Shearman & Sterling, the New York law firm. She graduated from Zurich University Law School and received a master of laws degree from New York University. Her father retired as a judge for the Court of Appeals in Zurich, and is now a lawyer in private practice. Her mother teaches French and introduction to medical terminology at the Pre-Professional School for Hospital Careers in Zurich.

Mr. Mason, who is known as Drew, works in Hong Kong as the head of the Asia Internet investment banking group for UBS Warburg, the investment bank. He graduated from Brown University, received an M.B.A. degree from Harvard University and was a Navy ensign on the aircraft carrier Abraham Lincoln during Operation Desert Storm. His father owns Eastwind Power Partners, an independent developer of power plants and a venture capital company in New York. He is also a retired captain of the Naval Reserve. The bridegroom's mother is a docent at Kykuit, the Rockefeller house in Sleepy Hollow, N.Y.
